additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Wheat Flour, Water, Mozzarella Cheese (Milk, Salt, Starter Culture, Non Animal Enzyme), Pepperoni (8%) (Pork, Salt, Soy Protein, Milk Solids, Spices, Lactose (Milk), Maltodextrin, Dextrose, Antioxidant (316), Emulsifier (450), Flavour, Fermented Rice, Herb Extract, Preservatives (250, 251), Garlic, Starter Culture, Smoke Flavour), Tomato Paste, Canola Oil, Vegetable Shortening, Sugar, Yeast, Salt, Natural Flavour, Thickener (415), Vegetable Powder, Soybean Oil, Soy Flour, Ascorbic Acid, Enzyme (Wheat)).

description: Mccain Family Pizza Pepperoni. A traditional regular crust family pizza topped with mozzarella cheese and sliced pepperoni.
name: Family Pizza Pepperoni
